text: Nde ntigem, Fhe Bakɨmen tari guari ki. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar, ana vhɨra ana Kaman vhen ki. Ana ana sarigim, ana zerav, nzan ndavi vherir kav, ana nza mbuim, nza kha kakaman Fhe Bakɨme mbui, “Dara.” 4.6 Araman kam, ana Zisas nzuai kam ma. Mbe mba kaman mbe “Dara”, mbe kha zitɨr ana mbui, “Aba”. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Zisas Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai. Ana anan Ndia ma. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, kha kakaman ana mbui, “Aba.” Mak 14.36 ganɨ.
